title: Pattern
medium: Technique: Plain weave fabric printed in light blue.                                  The technique intended to be white-on-white embroidery and cut fabric work.
creditline: Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art
description: Linear patterns suitable for collars, cuffs, handkerchiefs etc. Numbered 1 through 12.
